data.name: Sample - VirusTotal Premium - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "VirusTotal Premium" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Livehunt Ruleset Details
workflows.description: Retrieve a specific livehunt ruleset from VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Get Livehunt Ruleset Details

workflows.name: Get Retrohunt Job Matching Files
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all retrohunt job matching files from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Get Retrohunt Job Matching Files

routes.name: Start -> Get Retrohunt Job Matching Files

workflows.name: Get PCAP File Behaviour
workflows.description: Retrieves a PCAP file generated during a file’s behavior analysis in VirusTotal based on the report ID you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Get PCAP File Behaviour

workflows.name: Get Retrohunt jobs List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all retrohunt jobs from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Virustotal Premium: Get Retrohunt jobs List

workflows.name: Get Livehunt Rule Files List
workflows.description: Retrieve a hunting livehunt ruleset by hunting notification files relationship from VirusTotal based on the ruleset ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Get Livehunt Rule Files List

routes.name: Start -> Get Livehunt Rule Files List

workflows.name: Create Livehunt Ruleset
workflows.description: Creates a hunting livehunt ruleset based on the ruleset name, rules, and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Create Livehunt Ruleset

params.name: demo
params.rules: rule demo { strings: $ = "demo" condition: all of them }

workflows.name: IP Address > VirusTotal Premium> Enrichment
workflows.description: Retrieve the reputation of indicator of type ‘IP Address’ using VirusTotal

params.value:
VirusTotal Premium Detection Summary
Title of the document {{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}/{{vars.last_analysis_stats.values() | list | sum}}
Malicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious}}
Suspicious
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.suspicious}}
Harmless
{{vars.last_analysis_stats.harmless}}
Community Votes
Harmless {{vars.community_votes.harmless}}
Malicious {{vars.community_votes.malicious}}

arguments.name: VirusTotal Premium

arguments.verdict: {% if vars.last_analysis_stats.malicious > 0 %}{{"Malicious"}}{% elif vars.last_analysis_stats.suspicious > 0 %}{{"Suspicious"}}{% elif vars.last_analysis_stats.harmless > 0 %}{{"Good"}}{% else %}{{"No Reputation Available"}}{% endif %}
arguments.field_mapping: { "country": {% if vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.country %}"{{vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.country}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "asn": {% if vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.asn %}{{vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.asn}}{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "as_owner": {% if vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.as_owner %}"{{vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.as_owner}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "regional_internet_registry": {% if vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.regional_internet_registry %}"{{vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.regional_internet_registry}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "last_modification_date": {% if vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.datadata[0].attributes.last_modification_date %}{{vars.steps.Get_IP_Reputation.data.data[0].attributes.last_modification_date}}{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %} }

routes.name: Compute VT Summary -> Return Output Data
Get IP Reputation -> Is Reputation Found
Is Reputation Found -> Compute VT Summary
routes.label: Yes

workflows.name: Get Livehunt Notifications List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all livehunt notifications from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Get Livehunt Notifications List

workflows.name: Update Livehunt Ruleset
workflows.description: Updates a hunting livehunt ruleset based on the ruleset id, ruleset name, and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Update Livehunt Ruleset

workflows.name: Create Retrohunt Job
workflows.description: Creates a retrohunt job based on the  rules, and other input parameters that you have specified.

params.rules: rule demo { strings: $ = "demo" condition: all of them }

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Create Retrohunt Job

workflows.name: Get ZIP File URL
workflows.description: Retrieves a signed URL from where you can download the specified ZIP file from VirusTotal based on the ID you have specified. Note: The URL expires after 1 hour.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Get ZIP File URL

workflows.name: Download File
workflows.description: Download a file from VirusTotal based on the ID you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Download File

workflows.name: Get Livehunt Rulesets List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all livehunt rulesets from VirusTotal based on the input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: VirusTotal Premium: Get Livehunt Rulesets List

workflows.name: File Hash > VirusTotal Premium > Enrichment
workflows.description: Retrieve the reputation of indicator of type ‘File Hash’ using VirusTotal Premium

arguments.name: VirusTotal Premium
